wikipedia_page.main:
William Jefferies (christened 1 July 1777) or William Jeffries, was an English cricketer who played in a single first-class cricket match in 1803.
Jefferies was from Nottingham and is known to have played for Nottingham Cricket Club between 1800 and 1818. He made his solitary first-class appearance for a combined Nottinghamshire and Leicestershire side in 1803.
